Common.unknownError: Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later

OnBoarding.welcomeContent:
Created out of the desire for every dive to hold the opportunity to have an unforgettable encounter with a sea creature.

Divers everywhere make this happen by adding their own dive site and sea creature sighting contributions.

The result:
 The creation of a map of the optimum season to dive with any sea creature anywhere in the world!

I’m Emilio and I’m here to walk you through this short onboarding.
OnBoarding.diverNameContent:
Scuba SEAsons relies on user contributions of dive sites and sea creature sightings.

To credit and to let others know about your contributions please provide us with your “diver name”.
OnBoarding.locationContent:
Scuba SEAsons uses location tracking for two features within the app:

To Allow the map to be centred on your location.
&
To use your device's location to mark the GPS of a dive site for submission.
OnBoarding.galleryContent:
In order to make a sea creature sighting contribution to Scuba SEAsons, we need to request access to your photo library.

This will allow you to choose photos from your device to upload.
OnBoarding.notificationsContent:
In Scuba SEAsons we have a number of social features such as likes, comments and the ability to follow other divers’ activities.

To be notified when one of your submissions is accepted or when a user you are following makes a contribution, we ask that you please grant permission for notifications.
OnBoarding.doneContent:
That’s it!

You’re all setup.

If you ever want to change your diver name, you can do so from your profile page at any time.
OnBoarding.locationAlertMessage:
You previously declined to grant access to your location for this feature.

To grant access, please visit Scuba SEAsons under your device's settings menu.
OnBoarding.galleryAlertMessage:
You previously declined to grant access to your device's photo library.

To grant access, please visit Scuba SEAsons under your device's settings menu.
OnBoarding.notificationsAlertMessage:
You previously declined to receive push notifications.

To grant access and be notified of this user's activities, please visit Scuba SEAsons under your device's settings menu.

SettingsPage.aboutToDeleteAccountTitle: You Are About To Delete Your Scuba SEAsons Account
SettingsPage.deleteAccountMessage:
Are you sure you want to delete your account?

Please note that deleting your account will not delete your previous dive site or photo submissions. Please contact us if you wish to have those removed from the community.

PartnerRequestPage.step1Description: To qualify for a 'Partner Account' Your Account must represent a diving business that takes divers out diving.
PartnerRequestPage.step1Description2: Examples include: Dive Shops, Dive Charters, Diver Centres and Liveaboards.
PartnerRequestPage.step2Helper: To help you get the location
PartnerRequestPage.completeDescription: Your partner account upgrade request was successfully submitted, soon you will have access to exclusive partner features!
PartnerRequestPage.completeDescription2: Please allow up to 24 hours for us to review and approve your application.
PartnerRequestPage.explanation:
To qualify for a 'Partner Account' Your Account must represent a diving business that takes divers out diving. 
 Examples include: Dive Shops, Dive Charters, Diver Centres and Liveaboards

DiveSiteReviewer.step1Description: Let's start with the basics - when did you dive and what type of dive was it?
DiveSiteReviewer.step2Description: Tell us about the diving conditions you experienced during your dive.
DiveSiteReviewer.step3Description: Describe your dive and share photos to help other divers know what to expect.

DiveSiteReviewer.completeDescription: Your dive site review has been successfully submitted and will help fellow divers plan their next adventure.

CautionModal.cannotComplete: Your {{confirmationType}} cannot be completed just yet.
CautionModal.tripSubmissionBlurb: Trip Submission is still missing required information, please ensure that you fill out any fields highlighted in pink to sucessfully complete it.
CautionModal.seaCreatureSubmissionBlurb:
In order to sucessfully submit your sea creature sighting, please provide a photo as well as the name of the species of sea creature in the photo as well as the date it was photographed. 
 
 Note: The location will be automatically assumed to be the dive site you opened this page from.
CautionModal.diveSiteBlurb: Your dive site submission is still missing required information, please make changes and when the indicator to turns green your submission will be ready to submit.
CautionModal.partnerAccountBlurb: Your request is still missing required information, please ensure that you fill out all four fields to sucessfully complete your request.
CautionModal.tripEditBlurb: Trip edit request is still missing required information, please ensure that you fill out any fields highlighted in pink to sucessfully complete it.

PictureModal.shareMessage:
Check out this cool pic of a {{creature}} on Scuba SEAsons! It was taken by {{user}} at the dive site: {{diveSite}}, in {{location}} on {{date}}.
Maybe we should start contributing our pics as well!

Learn more about it here:
{{link}}

 We may contact you if we need to confirm any discrepancies.
